title: Building a Sustainable Single-Use Coffee Cup - Advertising Specialty Institute
summary: The Good Cup is a sustainable alternative to single-use coffee cups, featuring an integrated lid that folds and snaps in place, eliminating the need for a separate plastic lid. Made from FSC-certified paper with an aqueous coating, The Good Cup is fully recyclable and home compostable. This innovative design aims to tackle the environmental impact of plastic waste from disposable coffee cups, offering a more cost-efficient solution compared to other alternatives.
likely_naics_codes: ['322121', 'Paper (except newsprint) mills', '326199', 'All Other Miscellaneous Paper and Paperboard Product Manufacturing', '423830', 'Packaging Materials Merchant Wholesalers', '454111', 'Grocery Stores']
greenwashing: There is no evidence of greenwashing, as the article highlights the product's genuine environmental benefits and the company's commitment to sustainability.
